alert.note: Alert for Cullman; Madison; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marshall, southwestern Madison, north central Cullman and southeastern Morgan Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Holly Pond, or 12 miles west of Arab, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redstone Arsenal, Morgan City, Baileyton, Eva, Laceys Spring, Valhermoso Springs, Ryan Crossroads, Florette and Hulaco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
